showScoreExcerpt:
“I found ‘A Doll’s House’ slow and didactic. The ending felt more preachy. Although Herzog’s version is creative and modern, the pared-down play doesn’t do the subject matter justice. The actors work hard but they need more; unfortunately, here they got less.”

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: The pared-down play doesn't do the subject matter justice.
